column2: The City of the World's Desire, Constantinople, should return to it's role as capital of the Empire
The city of Rome has seen better days, but no one can deny its symbolic power. If you so wish, you may restore it as the capital of the Empire.
Rome once more becomes the seat of imperial power.

column1: #Localised New Mod-Added Move Capital related decisions

column2: Constantinople once more becomes the seat of imperial power.
